title: Can't access my emotes
body:
Since patch 7.22 I have not be able to access my emotes loadout. I play every day and every day I check to see if it's working. Every time I get the same error codes. Error code :EM01 & error code : EM05 I have only once been able to access them but got error code: EM03 and was not able to save. It "Feelsbadman" when you own them all and can't even use them. Please someone from Riot Games help me.  This really sucks.

Always yours,
Bowel Cramps
{{champion:26}} 

P.S. When you gave out skins in exchange for the old Rune pages. I never got anything. 
Whats with that?

replies.body: Those weird EM emote errors are a known issue right now, but go ahead and try running the client repair to see if that helps or not. I've heard back from a number of players that either running the repair or simply relogging a few times has been able to fix these emote errors.
